Immich Version 1.0.0 Released

â€” Alex Tran

Today marks a significant milestone in the Immich project - we're thrilled to announce the release of version 1.0.0!

What's New

This release brings several exciting features and improvements:

  • Enhanced photo library management
  • Improved machine learning capabilities
  • Better mobile app performance
  • New sharing features

Breaking Changes

Please note that this release includes some breaking changes. Make sure to backup your data before upgrading.

For more details, check out our full changelog.
